duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design and architecture of new and existing systems with a focus on reliability and scaling.
Mentor and lead an engineering team to ensure quality in the development team.
Participate in the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.
Deliver quickly to customers while keeping the greater architectural goals in mind and moving the team further towards them.
Foster inclusion and actively participate in improving the team culture every day.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent (Master's preferred)
